typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone as string,
		SMSOptin as boolean,
		SMSStatus as string,
		Email as string,
		ReceiptUrl as string,
		Total as decimal(18,2),
		PaymentTransactionId as string,
		HasBeenShipped as boolean,
		OrderDetails as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT   [dbo].[Orders].orderID , \nOrderDate, \nFirstName, \nLastName, \nAddress,\nCity, \nState, \nPostalCode, \nCountry, \nPhone, \nSMSOptin, \nSMSStatus, \nOrders.Email, \nReceiptUrl,\nTotal, \nPaymentTransactionId,\nHasBeenShipped,\n    (\n        SELECT OrderDetailId,\nProductId,\nQuantity,\nUnitPrice \n        FROM [dbo].[OrderDetails]  \n		where [dbo].[Orders].orderid = [dbo].[OrderDetails].orderid\n        FOR JSON auto\n    ) AS [OrderDetails]\nFROM [dbo].[Orders]  \n',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		orderID,
		OrderDate,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		Address,
		City,
		State,
		PostalCode,
		Country,
		Phone,
		SMSOptin,
		SMSStatus,
		Email,
		ReceiptUrl,
		Total,
		PaymentTransactionId,
		HasBeenShipped,
		OrderDetails
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		orderID,
		OrderDate,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		Address,
		City,
		State,
		PostalCode,
		Country,
		Phone,
		SMSOptin,
		SMSStatus,
		Email,
		ReceiptUrl,
		Total,
		PaymentTransactionId,
		HasBeenShipped,
		OrderDetails
	)) ~> sink1
